name: Dragon Knight
description: This a rogue-like 2D ARPG with an amazing storyline. You act as Sue, along with the Dark Knight, slay dragons to get stronger in the process. You'll encounter many a man during your journey to invincible, some could be allies while other have a wish to kill. Group up with different NPC and tell the story of your own.
minimum_requirements: 最低: OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP プロセッサー: 1.2 GHz メモリー: 2 GB RAM グラフィック: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 ストレージ: 2 GB 利用可能
